00029 RandomUniform :: RandomUniform(SystemPtr o)
00030         : Generator :: Generator(o), // call base class Constructor
00031         sampleTimeLastRefresh_(0),
00032         value_(0)
00033 {      
00034     init();

00040 { // base class destructor will reset all references in localGenerators_

00043 // =============================================================================
00045 void RandomUniform :: init()
00046 {   
00047 
00048     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameRefresh);
00049     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameRefresh] = aw::gTypeMono;
00050 
00051     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMinimum);
00052     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMinimum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00053 
00054     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameMaximum);
00055     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameMaximum] = aw::gTypeMono;
00056 
00057 
00058     // setup some default generators 
00059     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, 0,
00060                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00061     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 1,
00062                     aw::pContextNameNone);
00063     Generator::setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, 1,
00064                     aw::pContextNameTrigger);
00065 
00066     // init should always call reset
00067     reset();
00068 }
00069 
00070 // =============================================================================
00072 void RandomUniform :: reset()
00073 {
00074     value_ = aw::randomUnit();
00075     sampleTimeLastRefresh_ = 0;
00076 }
00077

00081 {
00082     static const std::string name("RandomUniform");
00083     return name;
00084 }

00088 // =============================================================================
00089 // get a value for a time/sample point
00090 double RandomUniform :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00091 {
00092 
00093     sampleTime_ = st;
00094     periodSamples_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRefresh]->getValueAtSample(st);
00095     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00096 
00097 
00098     periodSamples_ = getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(periodSamples_,
00099                      aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00100 
00101     // need to look for and deal with values over
00102     // % LONG_MAX
00103 
00104     // sampleTimeLastRefresh set to zero on init; if true then get new 
00105     // value
00106     if (sampleTime_ - sampleTimeLastRefresh_ >= periodSamples_) {
00107         sampleTimeLastRefresh_ = sampleTime_; // update to this time
00108         // get new value
00109         value_ = aw::randomUnit();
00110         // std::clog << "pre aw::denorm: " << "refreshed!" << std::endl;
00111     }
00112 
00113     return aw::denorm(value_, 
00114         pMap_[aw::pNameMinimum]->getValueAtSample(st),
00115         pMap_[aw::pNameMaximum]->getValueAtSample(st)
00116         );
00117 }
